body:
CLASS ${1:className} FINAL:
	/*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
	  Purpose:    
	  Parameters: 
	  Notes:

	END CONSTRUCTOR.
	DESTRUCTOR ${1:className} (  ) :
	END DESTRUCTOR.
END CLASS. /* ${1:className} */
